title: Legis Function in Iran and Russia

content.question: Which of the following legislative functions is similar in Iran and Russia?

choices.label: In both countries, the lower house approves bills from the upper house.
In both countries, the legislature confirms presidential nominees to the Cabinet.
In both countries, the legislature reviews and oversees the budget.
In both countries, there is a dominant political party that controls the lower house.

content.answer: In both countries, the legislature reviews and oversees the budget.

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Compare two or more course countries based on their political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
